story.text: Eddie Bauer Holdings Inc. EBHI.O said the waiting period required under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Antitrust Improvements Act for its proposed sale to a company owned by affiliates of Sun Capital Partners Inc. and Golden Gate Capital, has expired. The deal is expected to close in the first quarter of 2007, the clothing and accessories retailer said in a statement. (Reporting by Dilipp S. Nag in Bangalore)
story.title: eddie bauer says waiting period under hart - scott - rodino expires
